name: Alchemica
description:
Prototype of a crafting system for a game in development. You can use the cauldron to create potions (if it turns black, you can use the grate to clear the contents). There are various options sprinkled around to try and create more things. 

Games is taking some inspiration from Doodle God (one of my childhood favorite games). The assets are from Synty Store or edits made by me.
